introduction:
*own it own it own it own it...ah...*
...
Ah, apologies, I was not expecting such esteemed guests this hour; No matter, we shall make time. I, Mithradates IV, welcome you to the Kingdom of Pontus...
You haven't heard of my prestigious bloodline? Ah, remind me, did you say you were Persian or Greek?
neutralHello: What might I do for you friend...?
hateHello: Oh my Gods... I'm speechless. Absolutely dumbfounded. What could drive so many foreigners to butcher innocent people, their friends, neighbors, countrymen, just because they spoke a similar tongue to your's? I'm sorry beyond words, truly. We've had a couple squabbles in the past, but you must've understood, I mean you can't have thought me so cruel or insane that I could let stand such an atrocity; and by those that acted as if they were your allies, I mean I don't even feel like I know this peninsula now. I promise I'll do everything I can to see these regional ethnic massacres end at once. A tragedy, really. My deepest condolences.
tradeRequest: For you, I offer the riches of the Silk Road.
